content: **this crochet pattern is free to view online on my website here https //hookedonpatterns com/crochet-blog/free-summer-top-crochet-pattern-aviva** the aviva mesh top tee pdf pattern is available to download for a small price it includes extra high quality photographs not available online you will also receive an image-free printer friendly copy written using us crochet terms with a conversion chart to help with converting into uk terms a crochet pattern for a casual wear spring/ summer top it is made up of 2 identical panels with minimal shaping making it a super easy crochet project the top features a solid textured body with mesh top section you can wear the top with the hem hanging out straight or tuck it in to suit your own style i have used 100% cotton dk weight yarn for a cooler spring/summer tee you could use wool or acrylic for a warmer layering top for the colder months it is worked with a larger 6mm hook size for looser stitches to add drape to the fabric gauge 2 5cm square = 9 single_crochet+ch1 x 11 row i have used a 6mm hook and dk weight yarn the pattern includes instructions for ladies sizes from small 34 bust through to 3xl 54 bust designed with approximately 5 positive ease for a looser ﬁt you will need dk weight cotton yarn us light worsted - approx 1100yds/1100yds/1300yds/1400yds/ 1500yds/1600yds 6mm crochet hook or size needed for gauge yarn needle tape measure 2 stitch markers scissors
